lead_paragraph: Former FIFA president Sepp Blatter will discover on Monday whether he has won his appeal against a six-year ban from football imposed for ethics violations amid the biggest corruption scandal ever to shake the world soccer body.

headline.print_headline: Blatter Appeal Decision to Be Announced on Monday
headline.main: Blatter Appeal Decision to Be Announced on Monday

snippet: Former FIFA president Sepp Blatter will discover on Monday whether he has won his appeal against a six-year ban from football imposed for ethics violations amid the biggest corruption scandal ever to shake the world soccer body....
